price: Disfrutarán lo que Su Señor les conceda, porque en la vida mundanal hacían el bien,
arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: ākhidhīna mā ātāhum rabbuhum innahum kānū qabla dhālika muḥ'sinīna
